## Paste string

```{r}
# has a space between A and B
paste("A", "B")
# no spaces
paste0("A", "B")

str = "C"
# append A to the beginning
str = paste0("A", str)
str
# append B to the end
str = paste0(str, "B")
str
```

## If else

```{r}
x = "A"
if (x == "A") {
  print(x)
} else if (x == "B") {
  print(x)
} else {
  stop("Err : x must be either A or B !")
}
```

## Get matrix value by row/col name

```{r}
S = matrix(c(2, 1, -2, 0), nrow = 2)
rownames(S) <- c("A","B")
colnames(S) <- c("C","D")
print(S)
```
```{r}
# by index
print(S[1,2])
# by name
print(S["A","D"])
```
